pages.text: A single Molding Spell can only achieve one casting effect, but the spell pointer allows us to perform composite casting. First, we need to create a spell pointer at the Magic Synthesis Matrix and place it on the ground.
A one-way path that guides the flow of magic. Synthesize it at the Magic Synthesis Matrix. Its size is 2x2x3.

The spell pointer looks like a small whirlpool pointing vertically upward. We can throw the prepared $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spell$() and the $(#0000FF)Function$() Spell into it, and the spell pointer will arrange them in the specified order. After placing them, we can right-click the spell pointer with the wand to combine the $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spell$() with the $(#0000FF)Function$() Spell.

The combined Molding Spell released through the spell pointer will execute the spells inside it in order. Of course, a Molding Spell can also contain more than one $(#0000FF)Function$() Spell and one $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spell$(). We can add more $(#0000FF)Function$() Spells or $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spells$() based on our needs and combine them together. If the spell pointer contains and only contains one merged spell, right-clicking with the wand can separate the combined spell back into individual spells.

pages.title: Composite Spell
pages.text: For $(#0000FF)Function$() Spells, when the $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spell$() reaches the target, it triggers the $(#0000FF)Function$() Spell$() it carries. We can create composite debuff spells that can stack multiple debuff effects on the target at once. For example, a composite spell that carries Flame Attack, Flame Debuff, and Arc Debuff can be used with the Spirit Bow. After the mana arrow touches the target, it will sequentially apply these three $(#0000FF)Function$() Spell$() effects based on the target.

Thanks to different types and characteristics, $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spells$() can also use multiple $(#DA70D6)Form$() Spells in a single Molding Spell and combine them to trigger special effects. If you want to improve the efficiency of the spell, try different combinations of $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spells$(). The obtained $(#DA70D6)Form$() Spell Core will be unlocked with the mage and can be purchased with 5 Spirit Crystals.
The Wandering Mage sells $(#DA70D6)$(#DA70D6)Form$() Spells$() that you have already obtained.
